content: Electoral constituency in Ang Mo Kio, Singapore **Chong Boon Single Member Constituency** ([Simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese): 崇文单选区;[Traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_character): 崇文單選區) was a [single member constituency](/wiki/Single_member_constituency) in [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio), Singapore. It was carved from [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_SMC) division prior to the [1980 elections](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election) and lasted till the [1988 elections](/wiki/1988_Singaporean_general_election), when it was absorbed into [Cheng San Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Cheng_San_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty1980Sitaram Chandra Das[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)1984 ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election): Chong Boon PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Sitaram Chandra Das[Walkover](/wiki/Walkover)[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)13,877[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat)[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election): Chong Boon PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Sitaram Chandra Das11,05856.02[SDP](/wiki/Singapore_Democratic_Party)[Ling How Doong](/wiki/Ling_How_Doong)8,68143.98[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)20,10797.4[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics)) - 1984 GE's result - 1980 GE's result This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Chong Boon Constituency
